hypothesis_content.title: MSTR 20-Day vs 200-Day SMA Extreme Gap Reversion as BTC Proxy
hypothesis_content.statement: When the MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock price deviates more than 25% above its 200-day SMA while BTC is in a BULL regime, a mean reversion towards the 200-day SMA will occur within 15 trading days, providing a profitable short opportunity in MSTR or a basis trade against BTC.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR acts as a leveraged, sentiment-driven proxy for BTC. In bull markets, it can overshoot fundamentals. A >25% premium to its long-term average represents extreme bullish exuberance, which often corrects as profit-taking occurs, even within a broader uptrend. This is a 'within-trend' mean reversion play.
entry_conditions: MSTR 20-day SMA > 200-day SMA by > 15% (confirms extended trend)
Entry on next daily open after conditions met

exit_conditions.take_profit: MSTR price closes within 15% of its 200-day SMA
exit_conditions.stop_loss: MSTR price extends to > 35% above 200-day SMA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: In BULL regimes, MSTR maintains a >25% premium for more than 15 days in over 35% of observed cases, indicating the hypothesis fails to capture the timing of reversion.
